path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Request Network - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: No security vulnerabilities were discovered during the audit.
findings.description: The audit did not discover any security vulnerabilities in the smart contract.

findings.title: Redundant Condition Checks of uint8
findings.description: Removing redundant condition checks of uint8 < 256 (always returns true) can reduce gas burning.

findings.title: Potential Out-of-Gas Error in Loops
findings.description: In several for loops with condition uint8 < array.length, if array.length is greater than 255 then the loop will go through the entire 256 values before throwing an error.
